dict.acceptation: 殴打，打击；吹风，一阵风；意外的灾害；吹奏（声）；
吹，吹气；使爆炸；奏出，演奏；使气喘；
吹刮，吹动；随风飘动；鸣叫；喘气；

sent.orig: Allow for the official another, blew blow again, blow Acheron all the time, blow hell even.
sent.trans: 为官一任又一任，刮了又刮，一直刮到黄泉，甚至刮到地狱。

sent.orig: They blow hot and blow cold just as you do.
sent.trans: 她们也象你一样，冷一阵热一阵。

sent.orig: Spring breezes blow leaves green, and autumn winds blow fruit mature.
sent.trans: 春风吹绿了树叶，秋风吹熟了果实。

sent.orig: I prefer soccer commentator to report a match blow by blow.
sent.trans: 我宁愿足球比赛广播实况播音员详尽地报导比赛。

sent.orig: A few problems on blast furnace blow-in, blow-out and how to treat hearth freeze-up are discussed.
sent.trans: 从高炉开炉、停炉及处理炉缸冻结等方面探讨了高炉操作中的几个技术问题。
